page.title: 15A SCHOOLDAY IN EAST LINTON
page.content: I wake up at 7.45 am, get up and go down to the kitchen to make my packed lunch. I eat my breakfast. I go back to my room and dress while listening to the radio. I leave for school about 8.30am. Before the bell rings I play on the swings in the park with some of my friends. School begins at 9am with a prayer. We work on mathematics until playtime. I sometimes sell crisps in the school tuckshop. Until lunchtime we work on language. Some days we watch a television programme. We eat lunch in the dining room or, if it is a fine day, in the park. Today I ate a ham roll, crisps, coca cola, yoghurt, biscuits and an apple. In the afternoon we work on environmental study projects or do art or craft work. At 3,15pm I go home.
